body: We have two MKL libraries, mkl and mkl_dnn. mkl is a binary version where mkl_dnn is an open source version that gets linked statically into Tensorflow. That is why we have two directories under third_party. We have been having //third_party/mkl:LICENSE for long time without an issue. I think the check is failing because of mkl_dnn.
